Subject: Penguicon Robot Build
Description: Come help design and build a robot during the convention. Donations may be accepted depending on the robot design. No skill necessary to help but prior experience would be useful. Useful skills include familiarity with microcontrollers, structural design, costume design, programming, graphic design, and logic!  Speakers include:James Hice, John Bell - Track: DIY, Costuming  - Duration: 4 hours and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: Crappy Floors - Turning Lemons into Lemonade
Description: How to turn stained and damaged wooden floors into beauties. We will show how to strip, repair, design, layout, artistically stain, and refinish them into works of art at your feet.  Speakers include:Kathi Gagen, John Bell - Track: DIY  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
